author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24432 and subsequent fix https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/25085 and adaption of the LowPtGsfElectron reconstruction code to the moved GBRForestTools.

This should resolve urgent issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/26154.

Depends on external https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/4777.

Files with rebase conflicts that I had to solve manually:
* Here I just took the changes from 24432
  * RecoParticleFlow/PFProducer/plugins/PFEGammaProducer.cc
  * RecoParticleFlow/PFProducer/interface/PFEGammaAlgo.h
  * RecoParticleFlow/PFProducer/src/PFEGammaAlgo.cc
  * RecoEgamma/PhotonIdentification/plugins/PhotonMVAEstimator.cc
  * RecoEgamma/PhotonIdentification/interface/PhotonMVAEstimator.h
  * RecoEgamma/ElectronIdentification/plugins/ElectronIDValueMapProducer.cc
  * RecoEgamma/PhotonIdentification/plugins/PhotonIDValueMapProducer.cc

* These files were changed by another PR in the 10_3_X dev cycle (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/24131) before the PR to backport. I just took the code from master here to keep things easy:
  * RecoEgamma/ElectronIdentification/src/ElectronMVAEstimator.cc
  * RecoEgamma/ElectronIdentification/src/SoftElectronMVAEstimator.cc
  * RecoEgamma/ElectronIdentification/interface/ElectronMVAEstimator.h
  * RecoEgamma/ElectronIdentification/interface/SoftElectronMVAEstimator.h

#### PR validation:

Code compiles and local matrix tests pass.

If you want to test the PR locally as well, there are some extra steps needed besides the usual `git cms-merge-topic` or `git cms-rebase-topic`:
1. Get tinyxml2 [1] and put tinyxml2.h and tinyxml2.cc into CommonTools/MVAUtils/src/
2. Change `#include <tinyxml2.h>` in the GBRForestTools [2] to `#include "tinyxml2.h"`
3. Go into `RecoParticleFlow/PFProducer`, clone https://github.com/cms-data/RecoParticleFlow-PFProducer and rename the cloned repository to `data`.

[1] https://github.com/leethomason/tinyxml2
[2] https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/CommonTools/MVAUtils/src/GBRForestTools.cc#L10
title: [10.2.X] GBRForest implementation without TMVA
